abstract: Chicago police identify Lamar Harris as man who fired and wounded three police officers investigating drug activity in Logan Square neighborhood; Harris, gang member and felon with more than 40 arrests, was fatally wounded during shootout.
lead_paragraph: A man fatally wounded during a shootout with the Chicago police was identified Tuesday as a gang member and felon with more than 40 arrests.

headline.main: Illinois: Man Killed in Shootout That Injured Police Was Felon
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Man Killed in Shootout That Injured Officers Was Felon

snippet: A man fatally wounded during a shootout with the Chicago police was identified Tuesday as a gang member and felon with more than 40 arrests.
